options_explain_free_kindle.message:
@free.kindle.com: Works only with the Kindle 3, and only send over the Wi-Fi network.

The free.kindle.com option will not incur any data usage charges from Amazon.

If you have an earlier version of the Kindle, you'll receive the emails but the "Send to Kindle" documents will not be delivered to your Kindle.

options_explain_kindle.message:
@kindle.com: Works with all Kindle models over 3G and Wi-Fi.

Which will incur charges for 3G delivery by Amazon.

"Send to Kindle" assumes no responsibility for charges incurred by your use of this feature.

options_instructions.message:
Instructions

First, you must tell Amazon to allow "kindle@klip.me" email to reach your Kindle:

  1. Go to your Kindle management page.

  2. Under Your Kindle approved e-mail list, add the following address:
    kindle@klip.me
  3. Under Your Kindle(s), find the Kindle E-mail Address and enter that in the box below.

Please make sure that you have done this correctly.

options_label_byEmail.message: Email: Will send a verification message to your address.

options_label_verifyInfo.message: Verify your email address to confirm that you own the email.
